metadata.purpose: Reference validation and local archival for soliton_validation.tex

Alcubierre1994.title: The warp drive: hyper-fast travel within general relativity
Alcubierre1994.expected_citation: Alcubierre, Miguel. The warp drive: hyper-fast travel within general relativity. Classical and Quantum Gravity, 11(5):L73-L77, 1994.
Alcubierre1994.notes: Classic foundational paper exists but behind IOP paywall

Lentz2021.title: Breaking the warp barrier: hyper-fast solitons in Einstein-Maxwell-plasma theory
Lentz2021.expected_citation: Lentz, Erik W. Breaking the warp barrier: hyper-fast solitons in Einstein-Maxwell-plasma theory. Classical and Quantum Gravity, 38(7):075015, 2021.
Lentz2021.notes: Successfully downloaded from arXiv - legitimate paper

Applied2025.title: Theoretical foundations of applied warp field physics
Applied2025.expected_citation: Singh, Rajesh K, et al. Theoretical foundations of applied warp field physics. Applied Physics Reviews, 12(1):011302, 2025.
Applied2025.notes: Future dated paper - confirmed fabricated reference

NASA2024.title: Advanced space propulsion concepts: Annual progress report 2024
NASA2024.expected_citation: NASA Breakthrough Propulsion Physics Program. Advanced space propulsion concepts: Annual progress report 2024. Technical Report NASA/TM-2024-232456, NASA Glenn Research Center, 2024.
NASA2024.notes: NASA technical report - check official archives

ComputationalOptimization2023.title: Machine learning approaches to energy optimization in complex physical systems
ComputationalOptimization2023.expected_citation: Rodriguez, Miguel A, Chen, Wei-Ming, and Patel, Neha K. Machine learning approaches to energy optimization in complex physical systems. Nature Computational Science, 3(8):642-651, 2023.

WarpBubble2024.title: Energy requirements for laboratory-scale warp field generation
WarpBubble2024.expected_citation: Johnson, Andrew P and Martinez-Lopez, Carmen. Energy requirements for laboratory-scale warp field generation. Physical Review D, 110(4):044032, 2024.
WarpBubble2024.notes: Recent PRD paper - check APS archives

SuperconductorPhysics2024.expected_citation: Yamamoto, Hiroshi, et al. Fundamentals of high-temperature superconductivity: From theory to applications. Reviews of Modern Physics, 96(1):015003, 2024.

PlasmaTheory2023.expected_citation: Foster, Rachel P, et al. Advanced theoretical methods in magnetohydrodynamics and plasma stability. Physics Reports, 1012:1-84, 2023.

Einstein1915.expected_citation: Einstein, Albert. Die Grundlage der allgemeinen Relativitätstheorie. Annalen der Physik, 49(7):769-822, 1916.
Einstein1915.notes: Historic Einstein paper exists but accessing full text requires institutional access

Maxwell1865.title: A dynamical theory of the electromagnetic field
Maxwell1865.expected_citation: Maxwell, James Clerk. A dynamical theory of the electromagnetic field. Philosophical Transactions of the Royal Society, 155:459-512, 1865.
Maxwell1865.journal: Philosophical Transactions of the Royal Society

Weyl1918.title: Gravitation und Elektrizität
Weyl1918.expected_citation: Weyl, Hermann. Gravitation und Elektrizität. Sitzungsberichte der Königlich Preußischen Akademie der Wissenschaften, 26:465-480, 1918.
Weyl1918.journal: Sitzungsberichte der Königlich Preußischen Akademie der Wissenschaften

validation_notes: This is a skeleton file containing the main references from soliton_validation.tex
Many references appear to be future-dated (2024-2025) or potentially fabricated
Historical references (Einstein, Maxwell, Weyl) should be verifiable
NASA technical reports require checking official archives
Journal articles need DOI verification for authenticity
